faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Clear your doubts about how we work
faq.question1: How does the H diagnosis work?
faq.answer1: From the moment the client is interested in being our partner, we make a free diagnosis of the company's situation and show how H's ecosystem can transform your business.
faq.answer2: To know the investment value of your project, we need to know your business thoroughly, so we set up an operation with 100% effectiveness. Contact us and schedule a meeting.
faq.question3: How do I track my results?
faq.answer3: You will have direct and daily contact with a team in a WhatsApp group and receive weekly and monthly reports on how your operation is going, both via WhatsApp and other tools.

testimonials.title: Testimonials
testimonials.heading: Your company: the only solution your client needs.

reviews.name: Rafael Oliveira
reviews.body: I was impressed with the Free Diagnosis offered by H. They identified exactly where we needed to improve and gave us a clear action plan.

reviews.name: Beatriz Souza
reviews.body: H's personalized strategies were crucial for increasing our company's revenue. The team truly understands our needs and objectives.

reviews.name: Lucas Martins
reviews.body: Since we started working with H, our revenue has increased significantly. The team helped us identify new market opportunities and optimize our sales strategies.

reviews.name: Pedro Coelho
reviews.body: H has done surreal work regarding process step organization, didactics, presentations. Really an effective backstage.

reviews.name: João Pereira
reviews.body: H's strategic consulting was essential for our growth. We implemented their insights and within 6 months we had a 35% increase in our revenue.

reviews.name: Mariana Costa
reviews.body: The strategic approach allowed us to increase our revenue consistently, data-driven campaigns are extremely effective.

meteor.title: What does it take for your company to grow?
meteor.subtitle: We offer solutions for companies in the most diverse sectors

outsourcing.title: Outsourcing
outsourcing.description: Our mission consists of inserting a qualified and experienced team in your company to work on specific projects or to provide continuous support in your company. This enables H to optimize your internal processes, increase team efficiency and improve how you deal with data.

customProjects.title: Custom Projects
customProjects.description: Here you have customized solutions to meet the specific needs of your business. Our team works with agile methodologies to deliver fast and measurable results, always focusing on quality and within the timeline.

cta.heading: Discover our solutions
cta.description: Contact our team and learn how our ecosystem can leverage your business.
